welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Wood Dale, a charming city known for its beautiful parks and friendly community. Get ready to explore and experience all that this hidden gem has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal is used by United Airlines and their Star Alliance partners.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal is used by Delta Air Lines and their SkyTeam partners.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal is used by American Airlines and their Oneworld partners.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: This terminal is used by international airlines and non-alliance carriers.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also available for purchase.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pal-Waukee Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Pal-Waukee Airport is used for private and executive flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dupage County Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Dupage County Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free airport WiFi network.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights for select airlines.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the WiFi network for free by selecting 'Municipal Airport WiFi' and following the on-screen instructions.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lewis Lockport Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lewis Lockport Airport is responsible for handling all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
